snippet: Two embarrassing snags last week revived concerns about the reliability of the Boeing 787, as officials sought to cast them as normal growing pains for an advanced aircraft.
abstract: Two recent embarrassing snags with Boeing's 787 Dreamliner revive concerns about the reliability of the plane, as officials seek to cast them as normal growing pains for an advanced aircraft; UBS analysts say Boeing's costs do not appear to be declining rapidly enough for sales to turn profitable in 2015, and may not reach goal until 2021.

byline.original: By CHRISTOPHER DREW and JAD MOUAWAD

lead_paragraph: Two embarrassing snags last week revived concerns about the reliability of the Boeing 787, as officials sought to cast them as normal growing pains for an advanced aircraft.

headline.seo: Boeing 787 Plane Works to Overcome Snags
headline.main: New Problems With Boeing 787 Revive Concerns
headline.print_headline: New Problems With Boeing 787 Revive Concerns
